name: Animaspire
description:
In a distant realm a tower lies protected by lost souls...

In Animaspire you play as a wizard defeating ghosts and collecting score! To protect you soul and score you must scale the tower to the 20th floor and face down its final challenge!

This game was made in 3 days for the 17th Score Jam by Jakob "Jacke" Eriksson, Joseph "Dejojo Gewelber, and Mii

All sounds, art and code are custom made except for the lovely Thaleah Pixel Font by Tiny Worlds and the A* Unity Pathfinding project by Aron Granberg.
